Title: Pictorial explanation of the First Five Year Plan (1953-1957) for the development of the national economy of our nation
Designer: General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总政治部)
Notes: "Pictorial explanation of the First Five Year Plan (1953-1957) for the development of the national economy of our nation" (我国发展国民经济的第一个五年(1953-1957)计划图解) is a series of 12 posters, ca. 1955, possibly incomplete.The 10th sheet, "Plan to train construction cadres within five years" (五年内培养建设干部的计划), shows various training classes for future cadres in construction. Below, "​Indicators for improving labor productivity within five years" (五年内提高劳动生产率的指标), are referenced.
